comments_since_last_sample.body: When the pandemic hit and their kids were stuck at home, many parents were shocked at how really dumb their kid have become. The leftist educrats have turned their once happy children into woke, angry little morons with attitude.

Seriously... Democrats have underestimated The American Mama Bear! We will eat them for lunch! We will fight for our kids! Its our nature!
California had a GREAT opportunity to give the Left the finger, and pissed it away! I hope Virginia does not follow suite!!
